info.title: CS Association API
info.description: API for University Computer Science Association

post.description: Login user and return JWT tokens
Exchange a valid refresh token for a new access (and refresh) token.
Confirm password reset with token and new password

get.description: Check if a username is available for registration
List published posts with filtering and pagination

post.description: Create a new post (committee members only)

put.description: Update a post (author or committee only)

get.description: List approved comments for a post

post.description: Create a comment on a post

get.description: Get likes count for a post

post.description: Upload image to gallery (committee members only)

get.description: List all soft-deleted gallery images (Admin/Committee only)

post.description: Restore a soft-deleted gallery image (Admin/Committee only)

get.description: List events with filtering and pagination
List registrations for a specific event

post.description: Register current user for an event

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.
username.title: Username

online_link.description: Link for online events (e.g., Zoom, Google Meet)
online_link.title: Online Link

capacity.description: Maximum number of attendees (leave blank for unlimited)
capacity.title: Capacity

price.description: Price of the event. Leave blank for free events.
price.title: Price

subscribed_categories.description: List of announcement types to receive
subscribed_categories.title: Subscribed Categories
